transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{affecte/non_affecte} as string,
		{plateforme/vente directe} as string,
		{origine de la ligne} as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		{Code client livré} as string,
		{code client plateforme livree} as string,
		{code produit} as string,
		quantite as integer,
		ca as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque as string,
		marque_code as string,
		canal_distribution_final as string,
		{nom du canal} as string,
		canal_final as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé (vente directe)} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre (vente directe)} as string,
		{Facture (vente directe)} as string,
		{Type poste Facture (vente directe)} as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC offre} as string,
		{ATC livré} as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		N1groupe as string,
		N2groupe as string,
		N3groupe as string,
		N4groupe as string,
		N5groupe as string,
		N6groupe as string,
		N7groupe as string,
		N1groupedesignation as string,
		N2groupedesignation as string,
		N3groupedesignation as string,
		N4groupedesignation as string,
		N5groupedesignation as string,
		N6groupedesignation as string,
		N7groupedesignation as string,
		N1localedesignation as string,
		N2localedesignation as string,
		N3localedesignation as string,
		N4localedesignation as string,
		N5localedesignation as string,
		N6localedesignation as string,
		N7localedesignation as string,
		N1locale as string,
		N2locale as string,
		N3locale as string,
		N4locale as string,
		N5locale as string,
		N6locale as string,
		N7locale as string,
		{Hiérarchgroupe} as string,
		{Hiérarchlocale} as string,
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Nom du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{EPS_Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Numéro client indirect} as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Client Indirect_ Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Client Indirect_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N1 SAP } as string,
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N2 SAP } as string,
		{Client Indirect - Hiérarchie N1 SAP} as string,
		{Client Indirect - Hiérarchie N2 SAP} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dataCommerciale
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10000,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PLATEFORMES
source(output(
		{Année} as string,
		Documentation as string,
		Marque as string,
		Cible as string,
		{Périmètre} as string,
		Levier as string,
		Canal as string,
		{Hiérarchie inclues} as string,
		{Hiérarchies exclues} as string,
		Type as string,
		{Valeur Annuelle} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> levierPerformance
dataCommerciale filter({affecte/non_affecte}=="affecté") ~> filtreAffectation
dropColumns derive(HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " "),
		ATC = toInteger(ATC),
		ca_final = toDouble(replace(ca_final, ",", "."))) ~> cleansingInput
PLATEFORMES derive(HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansingPlateformes
cleansingInput, cleansingPlateformes join(cleansingInput@HubSAPid == cleansingPlateformes@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateformes
innerPlateformes derive({Type de vente} = WholeSalerID) ~> innerTypeDeVente
cleansingInput, cleansingPlateformes join(cleansingInput@HubSAPid == cleansingPlateformes@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftPlateforme
fullLeftPlateforme filter(isNull(cleansingPlateformes@HubSAPid)) ~> outerLeftPlateforme
outerLeftPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		data_origin,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = cleansingInput@HubSAPid,
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		canal_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque = marque_name,
		no_offre,
		Hierarchiegroupe,
		Hierarchielocale,
		N2groupe,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N1GroupeDesignation,
		N2GroupeDesignation,
		N3GroupeDesignation,
		N4GroupeDesignation,
		N5GroupeDesignation,
		N6GroupeDesignation,
		N7GroupeDesignation,
		N1LocalDesignation,
		N2LocalDesignation,
		N3LocalDesignation,
		N4LocalDesignation,
		N6LocalDesignation,
		N7LocalDesignation,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		ATC,
		ATC1,
		ATC2,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		N1groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		document_vente,
		designation = N5LocalDesignation,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommonLeft
dropColumnsInCommonLeft derive({Type de vente} = "Ventes directes") ~> leftTypeDeVente
dropColumnsInCommonInner, leftTypeDeVente union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
innerTypeDeVente select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		data_origin,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = cleansingInput@HubSAPid,
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		marque = marque_name,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		canal_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_name,
		no_offre,
		Hierarchiegroupe,
		Hierarchielocale,
		N2groupe,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N1GroupeDesignation,
		N2GroupeDesignation,
		N3GroupeDesignation,
		N4GroupeDesignation,
		N5GroupeDesignation,
		N6GroupeDesignation,
		N7GroupeDesignation,
		N1LocalDesignation,
		N2LocalDesignation,
		N3LocalDesignation,
		N4LocalDesignation,
		N6LocalDesignation,
		N7LocalDesignation,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		ATC,
		ATC1,
		ATC2,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		N1groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		document_vente,
		designation = N5LocalDesignation,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande},
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		{Type de vente}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommonInner
fullLeftUnion select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		data_origin,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		canal_jointure = canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		canal_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		no_offre,
		Hierarchiegroupe,
		Hierarchielocale,
		N2groupe,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N1GroupeDesignation,
		N2GroupeDesignation,
		N3GroupeDesignation,
		N4GroupeDesignation,
		N5GroupeDesignation,
		N6GroupeDesignation,
		N7GroupeDesignation,
		N1LocalDesignation,
		N2LocalDesignation,
		N3LocalDesignation,
		N4LocalDesignation,
		N6LocalDesignation,
		N7LocalDesignation,
		{Code postal},
		ATC,
		ATC1,
		ATC2,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		N1groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		document_vente,
		designation,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande},
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		{Type de vente},
		OrgCm = marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
Rename derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		id_canal_final = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		canal = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		id_canal = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		{Canal Final} = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		OrgCm = toInteger(OrgCm),
		canal_final = replace(lower(canal_final), " ", ""),
		year = toInteger(year),
		N1locale = replace(N1locale, " ", "")) ~> typeParse
typeParse filter(!isNull(ATC) && !isNull(distributeur)) ~> ATCandDistributeurNotNull
Filter3 derive({diffus/chantier} = iif(Cible!="DR", trim(split(Cible, " ")[2], " "), "diffus,chantier"),
		ID_KPI = "Sum_XRow_"+toString(RecordID)) ~> newColumn
uniqueLevier keyGenerate(output(RecordID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> RecordID
newColumn select(mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie = {Hiérarchie inclues},
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
levierPerformance filter({Année}=="2020") ~> YEARFILTER
Select3 derive(Marque = split(Marque, "."),
		Canal = split(Canal, ","),
		Hierarchie = split(Hierarchie, ","),
		diffusChantier = split({diffus/chantier}, ",")) ~> splitting
FlattenCanal foldDown(unroll(Hierarchie),
	mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenHierarchie
FlattenDiffusChantier foldDown(unroll(Marque),
	mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenMarque
FlattenMarque foldDown(unroll(Canal),
	mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCanal
ATCandDistributeurNotNull, lenHierarchie3 join(OrgCm == Marque
	&& canal_final == {diffus/chantier}
	&& canal_jointure == FlattenHierarchie@Canal
	&& N2locale == Hierarchie
	&& year == {Année},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerLevier
filtreAffectation select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = {plateforme/vente directe},
		data_origin = {origine de la ligne},
		reference = {code produit},
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = {code client plateforme livree},
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		qt_final = quantite,
		ca_final = ca,
		canal_final,
		POSSAMidString = {Code client livré},
		marque_name = marque_code,
		no_offre,
		Hierarchiegroupe = {Hiérarchgroupe},
		Hierarchielocale = {Hiérarchlocale},
		N2groupe,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N1GroupeDesignation = N1groupedesignation,
		N2GroupeDesignation = N2groupedesignation,
		N3GroupeDesignation = N3groupedesignation,
		N4GroupeDesignation = N4groupedesignation,
		N5GroupeDesignation = N5groupedesignation,
		N6GroupeDesignation = N6groupedesignation,
		N7GroupeDesignation = N7groupedesignation,
		N1LocalDesignation = N1localedesignation,
		N2LocalDesignation = N2localedesignation,
		N3LocalDesignation = N3localedesignation,
		N4LocalDesignation = N4localedesignation,
		N6LocalDesignation = N6localedesignation,
		N7LocalDesignation = N7localedesignation,
		{Code postal},
		marque = marque_code,
		ATC = {ATC Performance},
		ATC1 = {ATC livré},
		ATC2 = {ATC offre},
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		N1groupe,
		N3groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		document_vente,
		N5LocalDesignation = N5localedesignation,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
innerLevier filter(Type=="CA") ~> levierCA
levierCA pivot(groupBy(year,
		month,
		ATC,
		{Type de vente},
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	pivotBy(ID_KPI),
	{} = sum(ca_final),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot1
innerLevier filter(Type=="Quantité") ~> levierQA
levierQA pivot(groupBy(year,
		month,
		ATC,
		{Type de vente},
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	pivotBy(ID_KPI),
	{} = sum(qt_final),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot2
Pivot1, Pivot2 union(byName: true)~> Union2
typeParseLevier filter(length(Hierarchie)!=3) ~> lenHierarchieNot3
ATCandDistributeurNotNull, lenHierarchieNot3 join(OrgCm == Marque
	&& canal_jointure == FlattenHierarchie@Canal
	&& canal_final == {diffus/chantier}
	&& N1locale == Hierarchie
	&& year == {Année},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerLevier2
innerLevier2 filter(Type=="Quantité") ~> levierQA2
levierQA2 pivot(groupBy(year,
		month,
		ATC,
		{Type de vente},
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	pivotBy(ID_KPI),
	{} = sum(qt_final),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot3
innerLevier2 filter(Type=="CA") ~> levierCA2
levierCA2 pivot(groupBy(year,
		month,
		ATC,
		{Type de vente},
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	pivotBy(ID_KPI),
	{} = sum(ca_final),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot4
Pivot3, Pivot4 union(byName: true)~> Union3
Union2, Union3 union(byName: true)~> Union4
RecordID filter(!isNull(Documentation) || !isNull(Levier)) ~> Filter3
YEARFILTER derive({Libellé levié} = Levier+"-"+Documentation+" "+Cible+" "+{Périmètre}+" "+iif({Valeur Annuelle}=="YES", "Annuel", "Mensuel")) ~> libelleLevier
libelleLevier aggregate(groupBy({Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		{Hiérarchie inclues},
		{Hiérarchies exclues},
		Type,
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	{Libellé levié} = max({Libellé levié})) ~> uniqueLevier
uniqueLevier aggregate(groupBy({Libellé levié}),
	count = count({Libellé levié})) ~> Aggregate1
FlattenHierarchie derive(Marque = toInteger(Marque),
		{Année} = toInteger({Année}),
		Hierarchie = replace(Hierarchie, " ", ""),
		{diffus/chantier} = replace(lower({diffus/chantier}), " ", "")) ~> typeParseLevier
typeParseLevier filter(length(Hierarchie)==3) ~> lenHierarchie3
splitting foldDown(unroll(diffusChantier),
	mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier} = diffusChantier,
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenDiffusChantier
Union4 derive(Sum_XRow_1 = toDouble(byName('Sum_XRow_1')),
		Sum_XRow_3 = toDouble(byName('Sum_XRow_3')),
		Sum_XRow_10 = toLong(byName('Sum_XRow_10')),
		Sum_XRow_11 = toLong(byName('Sum_XRow_11')),
		Sum_XRow_12 = toLong(byName('Sum_XRow_12')),
		Sum_XRow_13 = toLong(byName('Sum_XRow_13')),
		Sum_XRow_7 = toLong(byName('Sum_XRow_7')),
		Sum_XRow_8 = toLong(byName('Sum_XRow_8')),
		Sum_XRow_9 = toLong(byName('Sum_XRow_9')),
		Sum_XRow_2 = toDouble(byName('Sum_XRow_2')),
		Sum_XRow_4 = toDouble(byName('Sum_XRow_4')),
		Sum_XRow_5 = toDouble(byName('Sum_XRow_5')),
		Sum_XRow_6 = toDouble(byName('Sum_XRow_6'))) ~> MapDrifted1
Select3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['TEMP_LEVIER_PERFORMANCE.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
MapDrifted1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TEMP_LEVIER_RH.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
ATCandDistributeurNotNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{SAUNIER DUVAL} as string,
		{208.0} as string,
		{Pièces détachées pour chauffage} as string,
		{05608600} as string,
		{5272.0} as string,
		{33.0} as string,
		{0.0} as string,
		{202008} as string,
		{2020} as string,
		{08} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['LEVIER_RH_PYTHON.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sortiePythonBase
typeParseLevier sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{SAUNIER DUVAL} as string,
		{208.0} as string,
		{Pièces détachées pour chauffage} as string,
		{05608600} as string,
		{5272.0} as string,
		{33.0} as string,
		{0.0} as string,
		{202008} as string,
		{2020} as string,
		{08} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['REFERENTIEL_PYTHON.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> REFERENTIELPYTHON
